remarks: Deduction from transitivity of biconditional.  Useful for converting conditional definitions in a formula.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.)
statement:
3bitr4d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
3bitr4d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( th <-> ps ) ) $.
3bitr4d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ta <-> ch ) ) $.
3bitr4d $p |- ( ph -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
